DOC.brief_summary: The main aim study test whether cognitive behavior therapy could effective treat obsessive compulsive disorder . Here , investigator test group effect 15 week long treatment deliver via Internet resident Stockholm County .
DOC.brief_title: Internet Cognitive Behavior Therapy ( CBT ) Obsessive Compulsive Disorder ( OCD )
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed Obsessive compulsive disorder accord DSM criterion Be least 18 year old YBOCS > 7 primary diagnosis substance abuse , psychosis , bipolar disorder , suicidal ideation , adjusted pharmacological treatment last two month current psychological treatment OCD , treat CBT last two year , serious somatic disease , Y‚ÄêBOCS > 31 hoard primary OCD subtype
